title: If Google has achieved 'quantum supremacy' it could be a gamechanger for tech
text:
It could be the working title for the next Bond movie – or possibly the scoreline in a game played at Hogwarts.

But Google’s claim to have achieved “quantum supremacy” this week at a hastily organised press conference in Santa Barbara didn’t provoke quite the reception the company had hoped for.

Instead of gasps of awe and excitement as the world absorbed news of the dawn of a new age of computing, the announcement instead triggered something else: an intense bickering session between boffins at two of the world’s biggest technology companies.

Quantum computers, which operate in an entirely different manner from regular machines by harnessing the power of physics on a subatomic level, are viewed...
description: It could be the working title for the next Bond movie – or possibly the scoreline in a game played at Hogwarts.
